# Task 1

```{r}
dt <-read_csv("https://query.data.world/s/khxg26i5c7sq4477phll42xsfdmsxx",col_names = c("Reference Number","Easting","Northing","Number","date","time","Class","Surface","Lightning","Weather","Type","Casualty Class","Severity","Gender","Age"),skip = 1)
dt

```

```{r}
d2 <- as_tibble(dt)
d2
```

```{r}
 Accident_Date <- d2$date
 Accident_Time <- d2$time
Date <- parse_date(Accident_Date,"%m/%d/%Y")
Time <- parse_time(Accident_Time,"%H%M")

```

```{r}
dt3 <- mutate(d2,Date,Time) 
New_dt<- select(dt3,-(date:time))
New_dt
```
